name: Roll Call
description:
You're the owner of the most popular tavern in all the kingdoms, but the real money isn't in ale these days, it's in adventuring! However, you're a business owner, with some culinary experience, and top notch customer service. You can't fulfill these bounties yourself, so you have to do the next best thing; bring together the perfect party for the job! And of course, collect on the finder's fee.

Deduce the creatures involved in the request, research their attributes, your party's capabilities, and send them out to cash in on some sweet experience points!

Press escape at any time quit the game, and pick up from the last bounty you started. There are twenty bounties to fulfill before you can comfortably retire.

This game was originally intended for a game jam, but for reasons independent to development, could not be completed in time for submission.
